laboratory_examinations.findings: Loss of heterozygosity at the VHL allele locus in VHL retinal hemangioblastomas; absence of loss in the vasoproliferative tumor.

High levels of transcript and protein for VEGF and CXCR4; low levels of CXCL12 mRNA in retinal hemangioblastomas associated with VHL disease; very low levels of VEGF and CXCR4 mRNA detected in the vasoproliferative tumor.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased expression of VEGF and CXCR4 detected in more active hemangioblastomas.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Abundant expression of VEGF and CXCR4 transcripts in VHL retinal hemangioblastomas; low expression of CXCL12.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: VEGF levels were significantly higher in case 2, indicating more active disease; highest level of CXCR4 transcript in case 3 with the lowest VA.
